snippet: Drew Hare threw for two touchdowns and ran for one, and Northern Illinois wrested the Mid-American Conference title from Bowling Green.
abstract: Northern Illinois routs Bowling Green, 51-17, in college football action to win its third Mid-American Conference title.
lead_paragraph: Drew Hare threw for two touchdowns and ran for one, and Northern Illinois wrested the Mid-American Conference title from Bowling Green.

headline.main: North Illinois Wins Mid-American Conference Title
